# --description-- Next, remove the `background-color` property and its value from the `.marker` CSS rule. # --hints-- Your `.marker` CSS rule should not have a `background-color` property and value. ```js assert(!code.includes('background-color') && !new __helpers.CSSHelp(document).getStyle('.marker')?.backgroundColor); ``` # --seed-- ## --seed-contents-- ```html Colored Markers

CSS Color Markers

``` ```css h1 { text-align: center; } --fcc-editable-region-- .marker { width: 200px; height: 25px; background-color: red; margin: 10px auto; } --fcc-editable-region-- ```
